Show:

Trigger Class

Extends BaseSound
Defined in: src/lib/models/Trigger.js:8
Module: Models

A sound model which triggers a single or multiple sound files with multiple voices (polyphony).

Constructor

Trigger

(
  • sounds
  • [onLoadCallback]
  • [onEndedCallback]
  • context
)

Defined in src/lib/models/Trigger.js:8

Parameters:

  • sounds Array/String/AudioBuffer/File

    Single or Array of either URLs or AudioBuffers or File of sounds.

  • [onLoadCallback] Function optional

    Callback when all sounds have finished loading.

  • [onEndedCallback] Function optional

    Callback when the Trigger has finished playing.

  • context AudioContext

    AudioContext to be used.

  • Methods
  • Properties

Methods

play

(
  • [when]
)

Defined in src/lib/models/Trigger.js:86

Triggers a single voice.

Parameters:

  • [when] Number optional

    At what time (in seconds) the sound be triggered

Properties

eventRand

SPAudioParam

Defined in src/lib/models/Trigger.js:75

Enable randomness in the order of sources which are triggered.

Default: false

pitchRand

SPAudioParam

Defined in src/lib/models/Trigger.js:66

Maximum value for random pitch shift of the triggered voices in semitones.

Default: 0

pitchShift

SPAudioParam

Defined in src/lib/models/Trigger.js:57

Pitch shift of the triggered voices in semitones.

Default: 0
